DomainSid.description: Unique string used to identify the domain that this certificate should be associated with.

$ul: **cert_in_validation**: Optional JSON field describing the status and upload date of a new certificate in the process of validation
**certificate_sid**: The unique string that we created to identify this Certificate resource.
**date_created**: Date that this Domain was registered to the Twilio platform to create a new Domain object.
**date_expires**: Date that the private certificate associated with this domain expires. You will need to update the certificate before that date to ensure your shortened links will continue to work.
**date_updated**: Date that this Domain was last updated.
**domain_name**: Full url path for this domain.
**domain_sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the Domain resource.
